arcs.name: Conan Arc
arcs.description: This arc covers the initial transformation of Shinichi Kudo into Conan Edogawa and his early interactions with the Black Organization.

questions.question: What was the name of the amusement park where Shinichi Kudo was poisoned and transformed into Conan Edogawa?
options: Haido Park
Beika Theme Plaza
Tropical Land

questions.question: What are the codenames of the two Black Organization members who poisoned Shinichi Kudo?
options: Gin and Vodka
Gin and Vermouth
Vodka and Chianti

questions.question: In which case did Conan first meet Heiji Hattori, and what revelation followed later?
options: Tsujimura Family Murder Case and Holmes Freak Murder Case
Tsujimura Family Murder Case and Osaka Summer Festival Murder Case
Holmes Freak Murder Case and Tsujimura Family Murder Case

questions.question: What was the alias Shinichi Kudo adopted after shrinking, and where did he move?
options: Conan Edogawa, Mouri Detective Agency
Conan Edogawa, Agasa's House
Shinichi Kudo, Kudo's House

questions.question: In which case did Conan first encounter Kaitou Kid, and what was the outcome?
options: The Chance Meeting Case
The Kidnapping Case at the Sumo Tournament
The Mystery of the Golden Score

questions.question: During the Game Company Murder Case, what did Conan learn about the Black Organization?
options: They use codenames based on alcohol
They are planning to kill Shinichi Kudo
They have a secret base in Beika City

questions.question: What was the cause of Akemi Miyano's death, and who was responsible?
options: Shot by Gin after refusing to reveal stolen money location
Poisoned by Vodka for betraying the organization
Killed by Vermouth in a car accident

arcs.name: Sherry Arc
arcs.description: This arc focuses on Sherry/Ai Haibara and her escape from the Black Organization.

questions.question: What was Sherry's real name, and her role in the Black Organization?
options: Shiho Miyano, scientist
Akemi Miyano, accountant
Elena Miyano, researcher

questions.question: How did she escape from the Organization, and what was her new identity?
options: Took APTX 4869, became Ai Haibara
Faked her death, became Mary Sera
Left Japan, became a spy for CIA

questions.question: Who adopted Shiho after her escape, and where did she study?
options: Professor Agasa, Teitan Elementary
Kogoro Mouri, Beika High School
Yukiko Kudo, Hakozaki Elementary

questions.question: During which event did Conan and Ai face Gin, Vodka, Pisco, and Vermouth?
options: Haido City Hotel incident
Tropical Land kidnapping
Osaka Castle murder

questions.question: What critical data did Ai recover at the Haido City Hotel?
options: APTX 4869 data, including effects and potential antidotes
Black Organization member list
Location of the organization's hideout

questions.question: Why did Gin believe Sherry had left Beika after the hotel incident?
options: Her behavior suggested she was no longer hiding there
She was seen leaving Japan
She contacted the FBI for protection

questions.question: What decision did Vermouth make after the Haido City Hotel incident?
options: She decided to stay in Japan
She left the country
She joined the FBI

arcs.name: Vermouth Arc
arcs.description: This arc focuses on Vermouth and her mysterious connection to Shinichi/Conan.

questions.question: During which case did Conan first meet Jodie Saintemillion?
options: Bus Hijacking Case
Sunset Mansion detective gathering
Haido City Hotel incident

questions.question: What happened during the bus hijacking, and who were key passengers?
options: FBI agents Akai & Jodie, Conan protected Ai
Black Organization members Gin & Vodka, Ran was kidnapped
CIA agents Kir & Eisuke, Heiji was involved

questions.question: What was the outcome of the Sunset Mansion detective gathering?
options: Murder solved, Kaitou Kid & Hakuba present
All detectives were killed, case unsolved
Vermouth revealed her identity, joined the good side

questions.question: What caused Ran to recall Shuichi Akai's identity?
options: Fever dream triggered memory of New York encounter
Saw a photo of Akai in the newspaper
Met Akai in person while on vacation

questions.question: What did Conan learn from Itakura Suguru about the Organization?
options: They forced him to develop a mysterious program
They killed his family
They stole his research on APTX 4869

questions.question: How did Shuichi Akai recognize Ai Haibara as Shiho Miyano?
options: He noticed her resemblance to Shiho from his past
He found her fingerprints on a Black Organization document
She accidentally called him by his code name

questions.question: What was the significance of the tapes left by Elena Miyano?
options: Contained crucial info on APTX 4869 & Org, hidden by Akemi
Had recordings of Black Organization meetings
Included Shiho Miyano's diary entries

arcs.name: Boss's Phone Number Arc
arcs.description: This arc focuses on Conan's discovery of the Black Organization Boss's contact information.

questions.question: During which case did Conan hear the Boss's keypad tones?
options: Halloween Party Case
Christmas Party Case
New Year's Eve Party Case

questions.question: What promise did Vermouth make to Conan and why?
options: Not to kill Shiho, because he saved her life
To help Conan find the Black Organization
To reveal the Boss's identity

questions.question: What song helped Conan discover the Boss's e-mail address?
options: Nanatsu no Ko
Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
Happy Birthday

questions.question: Why did Haibara call the email address 'Pandora's Box'?
options: It could alert the Black Organization
It contained the antidote formula
It had Vermouth's true identity

questions.question: What was the significance of the Boss's contact info?
options: Direct link to the leader; highly dangerous
Code to access the organization's database
Location of the organization's headquarters

questions.question: Why Conan Track Vermouth while she texting someone high ranked from BO?
options: To contact the Boss directly
To track leads and bait the Organization
To decode encrypted messages from the Organization

questions.question: What was the result of Conan's discovery?
options: He advanced, but greatly increased his risk
He solved all cases without any danger
He was captured by the Black Organization

arcs.name: Kir Arc
arcs.description: This arc focuses on the CIA agent Kir who infiltrated the Black Organization.

questions.question: How did Conan discover Rena Mizunashi was Kir?
options: Via deductions in an attempted assassination case
Through a tip from Vermouth
By finding her fingerprints on a weapon

questions.question: How did Eisuke Hondou behave after transferring to Teitan?
options: Watched Conan, showed keen interest in Rena
Befriended Ran, tried to get close to Shinichi
Investigated Professor Agasa, suspected him of hiding Sherry

questions.question: How did Eisuke manipulate Kogoro for info about Rena?
options: Through indirect questions while befriending him
By hacking into his computer
By following him and eavesdropping on his conversations

questions.question: Who informed the Org and Eisuke about Kir's fate?
options: Toji Funemoto
Jodie Saintemillion
Shuichi Akai

questions.question: What happened at Conan's second meeting with Saguru Hakuba?
options: Detective competition revealed rivalry and suspicions
Solved a case together, became friends
Fought each other, Heiji won

questions.question: What did Conan learn about Kir and Eisuke's father?
options: Both were CIA; Kir was a NOC agent
Both were Black Organization members; Kir was a double agent
Both were FBI agents; Kir was undercover in the Black Organization

questions.question: What was Gin's demand to Kir, and what was the outcome?
options: Kill Shuichi Akai; she faked it, Akai survived
Find Sherry; she located Ai Haibara
Steal a valuable artifact; she succeeded with Bourbon's help

arcs.name: Bourbon Arc
arcs.description: This arc focuses on the mysterious Bourbon and his investigation of Shuichi Akai.

questions.question: Who is Subaru Okiya, and what is his true identity?
options: Shuichi Akai in disguise, infiltrating the Org
A new member of the Black Organization
An FBI agent working undercover as a teacher

questions.question: Why did Bourbon introduce 'Scar Akai'?
options: To test reactions and confirm Shuichi's status
To lure out Vermouth
To find out if Conan is Shinichi Kudo

questions.question: What happened during the Bell Tree Express case?
options: Revealed suspicions on Vermouth, Amuro investigated further
Discovered a new member of the Black Organization
Found evidence of APTX 4869's side effects

questions.question: How did Amuro deduce Conan controls Sleeping Kogoro?
options: Through pattern observation in cases
By seeing Conan use a voice changer
From a conversation between Ran and Sonoko

questions.question: Why did Kaitou Kid disguise himself as Masumi in Blush Mermaid Case?
options: To create misdirection and attempt a theft
To help Conan solve a case
To reveal his true identity to Ran

questions.question: What did Jodie reveal about Akai's actions at Haido Hospital?
options: He was active and gathering intel; overheard by Amuro
He was injured and needed medical attention; seen by Eisuke
He was meeting with Vermouth; witnessed by Kir

questions.question: How did Masumi reveal her family background to Conan?
options: Casual convo during bowling hinted at their brother
Found a photo of them together in Masumi's room
Overheard a phone conversation between Masumi and her brother

arcs.name: Rum Arc
arcs.description: This arc focuses on the Black Organization's second-in-command, Rum.

questions.question: What was Rum's role at the International Economic Forum?
options: Represented Karasuma Group due to leader's poor health
Was the main speaker at the forum
Revealed his true identity as the Boss

questions.question: What's the significance of 'ASACA RUM' in Kohji Haneda's case?
options: Dying message implicating Rum and possibly Asaka (Mary)
Code for a secret meeting place
Password for the Black Organization's database

questions.question: Why did Conan suspect Asaka might be Rum?
options: She had unusual strength and mystery around her
She was seen with Gin and Vodka
She knew too much about the Black Organization

questions.question: How did Rum show interest in Shinichi Kudo?
options: Sent a message: 'Time is Money!'
Tried to poison him during a meeting
Hired an assassin to kill him

questions.question: What was Rum's plan against Yusaku Kudo, and how was it foiled?
options: Planned to kill him; FBI + Yusaku outsmarted him
Tried to frame him for a crime; plan failed
Offered him a position in the Black Organization; he refused

questions.question: What was the outcome of the hunt for Camel?
options: Camel faked his death; Rum orchestrated the mission
Camel was captured by the Black Organization; Rum interrogated him
Camel escaped with important information; Rum was furious

questions.question: Who is Rumi Wakasa, and what did Rum do about her?
options: Suspected Rum link; Rum ordered a hit but failed
Was actually Rum in disguise; identity revealed
Helped Conan uncover Rum's identity; both were killed by the Organization
